name: securethebox
description: A platform to assess and measure security skills.

scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "Deploy" && git push
scripts.commit-all: npm run commit ; cd securethebox-challenge ; npm run commit ; cd .. ; cd securethebox-client ; npm run commit ; cd .. ; cd securethebox-server ; npm run commit
scripts.deploy-frontend1: cd securethebox-client ; echo 'yarn run build' ; yarn run build
scripts.deploy-frontend2: cd securethebox-client ; echo 'firebase use ncmd-stb-prod firebase deploy' ; firebase use prod && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy-backend1: cd securethebox-server ; heroku git:remote -a stb-server ; git add . ; git commit -m "Deploy" ; git push heroku master

author: Charles Chong
